hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aisha said:"In my house there was a cloth on which there were images, which I covered a closet which is in the house, and the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to pray toward it. Then he said: '0 Aisha, take it away from me.' So I removed it and made pillows out of it

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ إِلَى ثَوْبٍ فِيهِ تَصَاوِيرُ
chapter.eng-name: The prayer toward a cloth containing images
